coveredinwarranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Only Manufacturing Defect on Camera Body & Lens.
notcoveredinwarranty: Storage with Mothballs or Leakage of Batteries. Warranty of the Product Does not Cover Other Accessories Like Case, any Malfunction Resulting from Inadequate Safekeeping, Water, Repair or use of any Consumables or Accessories Other Than Those Supplied by Canon India / Canon India Authorised Channel., Strap, Lens cap etc or Consumables Like Batteries. Warranty Does not Cover the Replacement of the Product. not Covered if the Defect is a Result of Physical Breakage, the Model no or Serial no Sticker of the Product is Removed, Connections or Electrical Faults External to the Product. Warranty Does not Cover Damages Caused due to Acts of god & Force Majeure., Repaired, Storage at High Temperatures or Humidity, Dropping, Maintained, any Damage Arising out of Unauthorized Modification or Alteration, the Product is Modified, Disassembled And/or by a Party not Authorized by Cipl, the Product is Physically Damaged, Mutilated or Tampered With, the Product is Operated And/or Maintained in Ways Other Than Recommended by Canon in the User Manual in Writing., Fire and /or Shock, Sand, any Malfunction Resulting from Exposure to Dirt
